I would recommend this game to anyone, Portal is my favourite series of games ever, It's like a story while your playing a game and with great dialougue, gameplay and mechanics I say you pick this up, but make sure to play Portal 1 first, it'll make more sense if you do!

I love the humor in this game, keeps me going. Puzzles are fun as well.

The story on this game is just amazing and if you are a huge portal fan this game will make you extremley happy. The co-op is also very fun and continues on the story. Everyone on steam should have this game. Best portal of them all :D

This is a really great game. It is clever and funny, and has great plot-twists. It is a bit on the short side if you don't count the perpetual testing initiative, but you're definitely going to enjoy it.

Portal 2 is the perfect sequel to the original. More puzzles, more complicated, more story, and more humor. Really well written and I couldn't put it down. The Co-Op is al ot of fun and now that you can create your own levels and download those of others this game has even more replayability.
Worth it for the story and co-op play
Veeeeery Craaazy

A very Good game the plot is mind killing and the puzzles seem a bit dumbed down from Portal (probabbly because they also exported it to console) The gameplays great and you get very attached to the charecters very quickly I reccomend you buy this game!
Amor puro.

One of the most fun games I have played, I have it on both my mac and pc and it works great. The game has a great story and some really well done puzzles.  Fun to play and a very satisfying ending. Highly recommend it.

fun puzzle game that will keep you thinking with portals.

Chell and GLaDOS are back for more testing! This time we get to meet Wheatly, hear pre-recorded messeges from Aperture founder Cave Johnson, and play in a great co-op section. 

I absolutely love and recomend this game!
Worth buying any day! Just the single player is worth it! Heard co-op is great too!

This is a game i would recomend for anyone who played the first portal or just like puzzleing platformers. It may be "old" now but it is a game that anyone and everyone should have. The graphics and atmophere reely set the mood for me and the voices for each of the characters is a 5/5 for me and the length of the game is fun too. The only problem that may be in this is that once you beat it in single player that's it for that. The only thing that will be left to do is the level making and playing what the community makes which is amazing in it's self. The overall rating i would give this from my playing is 9/10 seperating the multiplayer for i do not really play it.
Good stuff

Was soll man schon zu Portal 2 sagen? Schaut euch keine Trailer an, kauft es und zockt es, ihr werdet es lieben. Vor allem im Koop-Modus mit anderen Spielern. Sehr sehr lustig und ironisch. Die Levels sind oft knifflig und man muss gut nach denken, oft aber so komplex, dass man denkt "oh man bin ich doof", weil man nicht sofort auf die L√∂sung kam. Absolut empfehlenswertes Spiel!!
Logic pure logic and creativity to solve this puzzles! I recommend it A LOT!

Hilarious and fun. Only critique is that I wish it was longer.

Not worth it at full price. If you bought it at full price I am sorry. It is worth it now with all the discounts it gets. It's a solid 6-8 hour puzzle game. Haven't tried the co-op. I guess that could be fun.
c'mon guys, its Portal 2. Enough said.
The best ever Valve game!
Even if you don't like puzzle games, you should play this one. I normally hate puzzle games, but this was a blast.
A cinematic puzzle game.  Voice acting is perfect.  Also has a co-opt mode where you can yell at your friends to solve the damn puzzle faster.
